page.title: 18HIGH HURSTWOOD SOCIAL LIFE 2
page.content: Annual events in the village include the Summer Fete which is always held in June with its side shows, stalls and dog show. The High Hurstwood Horse Show attracts riders from miles around. A Bonfire Night Party takes place at the beginning of November with a torchlight procession, fancy dress competition for the children and firework display, followed by hot dogs and other refreshments served in the Village Hall. But the finest pursuit in which every member of the community can take part is within the country- side itself. It is a particularly beautiful part of East Sussex and High Hurstwood can produce some of the loveliest walks and breathtaking views for miles around. Man-made pleasures might not abound but natural pleasures are here for all to enjoy.
